      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.compoundDeadEnds()
      Returns the dead-end compounds: compounds which have either an in-degree or out-degree of 0.

      Returns a map of compartment strings and vertex sets.

      Returns the map of compartment strings and the substrates/products of the reaction which belong to the compartment.

      Collection<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.getReactions()

      HashMap<Vertex,Double[]> MetabolicGraph.knockoutSet(Vertex knockout, double threshold)
      From a given knockout reaction, returns the set of reactions that are affected by the knockout, and their knockout strength, up to the given threshold.

      Returns the set containing all second neighboring vertices.
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.predecessorsOf(Vertex v)
      Returns the set containing all second predecessor vertices.

      Calculates the global propagation of the local reaction centralities.

      Robert Tarjan's algorithm for calculating the strongly connected components.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultWeightedEdge MetabolicGraph.addEdge(Vertex source, Vertex target)
      Adds an edge to connect source and target.

      Adds the edge to connect source and target.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.addVertex(Vertex vertex)
      Adds the vertex to the graph and creates an entry in the compounds or reactions HashMap.
      int[] MetabolicGraph.balance(Vertex reaction, boolean ignoreUnknown)
      Determines the mass balance of a reaction by summing over the substrate and product masses, multiplied by the corresponding stoichiometric coefficients.
      boolean Vertex.compare(Vertex v)
      Compares the member variables of this vertex to the member variables of the given vertex.
      int VertexComparator.compare(Vertex v1, Vertex v2)
      Compound vertices are compared their name and compartment, reaction vertices by their name and reversibility.
      BigDecimal MetabolicGraph.fixStoichiometry(Vertex reaction)
      Fixes the stoichiometry of the reaction by finding the smallest factor such that for all compounds i: factor*weight[i] is an integer.
      HashMap<String,HashSet<Vertex>> MetabolicGraph.getCompartments(Vertex reaction)
      Returns the map of compartment strings and the substrates/products of the reaction which belong to the compartment.
      Double MetabolicGraph.getDeltaGDifference(Vertex reaction, int side, Vertex compound, Vertex substitute, int[] solve)
      Calculates the difference in deltaG of the reaction after substituting compound by substitute on the given side, without modifying the network.
      Double MetabolicGraph.getDeltaGDifference(Vertex reaction, int side, Vertex compound1, Vertex compound2, Vertex substitute1, Vertex substitute2, int[] solve)
      Calculates the difference in deltaG of the reaction after substituting compound1 and compound1 by substitute1 and substitute2 on the given side.
      Double MetabolicGraph.getDeltaGr(Vertex reaction, boolean reversible)
      Calculates the deltaGr of a reaction by summing over the negative deltaGf of substrates and the positive deltaGf of products, multiplied by the stoichiometric coefficients.
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.getDuplicates(Vertex reaction, boolean testReversed)
      Returns the duplicates of a reaction.
      String MetabolicGraph.getReactionEquation(MetabolicGraph graph, Vertex reaction)
      Returns the equation of the given reaction in the given graph as String.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.hasCycle(Vertex reaction)
      Determines whether the given reaction has a cycle, i.e., there is a substrates which is also a product.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.hasEdge(Vertex vertex1, Vertex vertex2)
      Tests whether the graph has an edge connecting vertex1 and vertex2 in either direction.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.isAdjacent(Vertex c1, Vertex c2)
      Tests if compound c1 is adjacent to compound c2, i.e., if there is a reaction which has c1 as a substrate and c2 as a product.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.isCyclic(Vertex reaction, boolean print)
      Determines whether the given reaction is a cyclic reaction, i.e., the substrates and products are identical and have equal weights.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.isExternal(Vertex vertex)
      Determines whether the given vertex (compound or reaction) is external.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.isNeighbour(Vertex v1, Vertex v2)
      Tests if the two compounds are neighbours, i.e., if they are connected by a substrate-product or product-substrate relationship.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.isReachable(Vertex c1, Vertex c2, HashSet<Vertex> visited)
      Test if compound c2 is reachable from compound c1, i.e., if there exists a directed path from c1 to c2.
      HashMap<Vertex,Double[]> MetabolicGraph.knockoutSet(Vertex knockout, double threshold)
      From a given knockout reaction, returns the set of reactions that are affected by the knockout, and their knockout strength, up to the given threshold.
      double MetabolicGraph.localCentrality(Vertex reaction1, Vertex reaction2, boolean reversible)
      Calculates the local essentiality of reaction1 for reaction2, i.e., the reciprocal of the smallest in-degree of a product of reaction1 which is substrate of reaction2, or 0, if no such compound exists.
      double MetabolicGraph.localEssentiality(Vertex reaction, boolean reversible)
      Calculates the local reaction essentiality, i.e., the sum of essentialities of the reaction for all its successor reactions.
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.neighborsOf(Vertex v)
      Returns the set containing all second neighboring vertices.
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.predecessorsOf(Vertex v)
      Returns the set containing all second predecessor vertices.
      static void Utilities.printReaction(MetabolicGraph graph, Vertex reaction, boolean printMass, boolean printDeltaG)
      Prints the equation of the given reaction.
      org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultWeightedEdge MetabolicGraph.removeEdge(Vertex source, Vertex target)
      Removes the edge connecting source and target.
      boolean MetabolicGraph.removeVertex(Vertex vertex)
      Removes the vertex from the graph and removes the entry from the compounds or reactions HashMap.
      HashSet<Vertex> MetabolicGraph.successorsOf(Vertex v)
      Returns the set containing all second successor vertices.

      Writes the given compound (name, mass, deltaG) to the given output file writer.
